description: A person is lying on a bed in a shared living space, covered with a blanket, using a phone, and occasionally gesturing with their arm. The environment includes various garments, a tapestry, a laptop, and other personal items. The camera remains mostly static but pans to reveal more of the room and another person under a blanket on a different bed.
activity_differential: person resting and using phone in shared living space
person gesturing while lying on bed
multiple people relaxing in a dormitory or hostel room

attributes: gradient of colors from teal to soft purple
shades of yellow, orange, and red
